org.hkijena.acaq5.api.registries

Class ACAQDatatypeRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hkijena.acaq5.api.registries.ACAQDatatypeRegistry

  • public class ACAQDatatypeRegistry
extends Object
    Contains known ACAQData types, and associates them to their respective ACAQDataSlot.

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates a new instance

      • convert

        public ACAQData convert(ACAQData inputData,
                        Class<? extends ACAQData> outputDataType)
        Converts the input data to the output data type
        Parameters:
        inputData - the input data
        outputDataType - the output data type
        Returns:
        the converted input data. Throws an exception if conversion is not possible

      • isConvertible

        public boolean isConvertible(Class<? extends ACAQData> inputDataType,
                             Class<? extends ACAQData> outputDataType)
        Returns true if the input data type can be converted into the output data type. Returns true if both data types are the same or trivially convertible (inheritance)
        Parameters:
        inputDataType - the input data type
        outputDataType - the output data type
        Returns:
        if the types are convertible

        Registers a data type
        Parameters:
        id - The datatype ID
        klass - The data class
        source - The dependency that registers the data

      • isTriviallyConvertible

        public static boolean isTriviallyConvertible(Class<? extends ACAQData> inputDataType,
                                             Class<? extends ACAQData> outputDataType)
        Returns true if the input data type can be trivially converted into the output data type. A trivial conversion is applied when the input data is the same as the output data type or inherits from it.
        Parameters:
        inputDataType - the input data type
        outputDataType - the output data type
        Returns:
        if the output data type can be assigned from the input data type without any explicit conversion rules

        public static ACAQDatatypeRegistry getInstance()
        Returns:
        Singleton instance
